text: "Young Blood" is a 1957 song by The Coasters and went to number 8 in the United States and went to number 1 on the R&B; Billboard charts. ==Bad Company cover== In 1976, British band Bad Company covered Young Blood for their third studio album Run with the Pack. It was released as a single and went to the top 20 in both the United States and Canada. ==References== Category:1957 songs Category:The Coasters songs Category:The Beatles songs Category:Leon Russell songs Category:Bad Company songs Category:Jerry Lee Lewis songs Category:Jimmy Barnes songs
title: Young Blood (The Coasters song)
